headerText: Smooth animations help make a UI feel great. Using Vue's transition system and re-usable functional components, you can easily control the motion of your application. Most components can have their transition altered through the transition prop.

slideXTransitions.desc: Slide x transitions move along the horizontal axis.

scaleTransition.desc: Many of Vuetify's components contain a transition prop which allows you to specify your own.

fadeTransition.desc: Another example of the fade transition can be found on the Carousel component.

expandTransition.desc: An example of the expand transition can be found on the Expansion Panel component.

customOrigin.desc: Programmatically control the transition origin with a simple prop.

todo.desc: Using multiple custom transitions, it is easy to bring a simple todo list to life!
